Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
Pardon me, I have to eat this quickly...

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
Oh, are you still working at this hour?

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
I need to keep the dining room spotless, most of
all.

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
I can be a bit slow from time to time. My lady
often scolds me for it...

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
What Miss Elise says goes. Talking back would
be unthinkable.

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
I need to work more quickly, or my lady will
dismiss me for certain.

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
I might be wrong, but it seems Miss Elise
doesn't shout quite as often as she used to.

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
I think my work is improving these days.
<PAGE>
Perhaps because Miss Elise doesn't scold me as
often anymore!

<NAME_MOB_PETTY>
My lady is actually a very kind person.
